entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:29 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 10:43 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
